title: Add provided MP3 as a static frontend asset for background music

requirements.summary: Place the user-provided i-wanna-be-yours.mp3 into the expected frontend public assets path so existing getAssetUrl-based background music loading works at runtime.
acceptanceCriteria: A file exists at frontend/public/assets/audio/i-wanna-be-yours.mp3 in the codebase.
The deployed site successfully requests and loads the MP3 from the correct SPA base path (i.e., via the existing getAssetUrl('audio/i-wanna-be-yours.mp3') behavior) without a 404.
After the user accepts the intro overlay and unmutes background music, the track plays and loops; when the user mutes it stops/pause as expected.

file_operations.description: Add the attached MP3 file to this exact static asset location so the existing ValentineBackgroundMusic code (new Audio(getAssetUrl('audio/i-wanna-be-yours.mp3'))) can load it under Vite BASE_URL without changing any UX or hardcoding root-relative paths.
